title: Listeners' Favorite: 'The Piper And The Pooka'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This episode was chosen by you, the fans! Thanks for the submissions! In this Irish folktale, Damian McGinty ("Glee," "Celtic Thunder") stars as a musician with a serious case of butterflies.
